>
[Golden Body](/Feats.aspx?ID=1166) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 76</row>

</column>

---

You perfect your body, refining the flex of every muscle and the bend of every joint to maximum efficiency. Your unarmed Strikes gain the [deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait, and you have [fast healing 20](/Rules.aspx?ID=796), causing you to regain 20 HP at the start of each of your turns provided you have at least 1 HP.

<title level="2">Paragons of Promise</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 75</row>

The citizens of Promise represent some of the most capable experts, greatest minds, and powerful warriors on Golarion—ideal teachers and trainers for PCs who want to maximize their own potential. If the PCs secure Visitor’s Pins or an alliance with Mengkare, their access to Promise’s trainers and records unlock all of the following uncommon class feats.

**Related Feats**: [Apex Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1160), [Aura of Unbreakable Virtue](/Feats.aspx?ID=1161), [Bloodline Metamorphosis](/Feats.aspx?ID=1162), [Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1163), [Emblazon Divinity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1164), [Enduring Debilitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1165), [Song of the Fallen](/Feats.aspx?ID=1168), [Spell Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=1843), [Superior Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=1170), [Ultimate Flexibility](/Feats.aspx?ID=1732), [Unstoppable Juggernaut](/Feats.aspx?ID=1631)
